Posts.Content:
Breast Cancer
Breast cancer is a cancer that starts in the breast, usually in the inner lining of the 
milk ducts or lobules. There are different types of breast cancer, with different stages
(spread), aggressiveness, and genetic makeup. With best treatment, 10-year disease-free
survival varies from 98% to 10%. Treatment includes surgery, drugs (hormone therapy 
and chemotherapy), and radiation.
For More Detail Visit
http://bilalhealthclinic.com/breastcancer.html
